result.name: export-control-licence-applications
result.notes: The Export Control Organisation controls the export of military and dual-use items. It does this by issuing export licences to UK companies who wish to export controlled goods overseas. Export Control Organisation maintains records of licence applications on its electronic licence application system ("SPIRE") and on its document management system ("Matrix").

organization.name: department-for-business-energy-and-industrial-strategy
organization.title: Department for Business, Energy and Industrial Strategy
organization.description:
The department brings together responsibilities for business, industrial strategy, science, innovation, energy, and climate change.
We are responsible for:
developing and delivering a comprehensive industrial strategy and leading the government’s relationship with business
ensuring that the country has secure energy supplies that are reliable, affordable and clean
ensuring the UK remains at the leading edge of science, research and innovation
tackling climate change

result.title: Export control licence applications

extras.value: N/A  There are no plans to place comprehensive data into the public domain for reasons of commercial confidentiality.  Summary data is published quarterly at http://www.exportcontroldb.bis.gov.uk.
